org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support
Class AeScopedObject

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support.AeScopedObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeLocatableObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeCorrelationSet, AePartnerLink
public class AeScopedObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeLocatableObject

Implements a convenience base class for implementation objects that are bound to a scope.
